attributes.comment:
Adopting our daughter was the best thing we have ever been a part of. We would
love the opportunity to adopt again. However, the cost of adoption is overwhelming
to say the least. We are not rich, we do not spend our money irresponsibly, we
live simply. As does the majority of Americans. By increasing fees by such a
large amount (66% !!) it makes adoption seem that much more impossible. And
please try and remember, who suffers from this the most. Put yourself in the
place of a 3 year old child who wishes every day for a mommy and daddy and then
tell them your going to make it even harder for their wish to come true. Please,
think of all the children you have a hand in helping by keeping adoption fees down.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Christine I. Glowacki
